package.name: ColorBar15
package.shortDescription: ColorBar15 allows you to personally style your status bar with colors and more.

descriptionlist.description:
ColorBar15 is a tweak available on both rootless and rootful jailbreaks.
It has been tested and works perfectly fine with XinaA15, Dopamine, Palera1n, and will probably work on other jailbreaks too.

changelog.change: Added the ability to set a status bar background color
Added the ability to change the camera and microphone indicator colors, or remove them altogether
Added the ability to change the color of different pill indicators on notched devices and the background on non-notched devices
Added the ability to change the color of the network activity indicator on applicable devices
Other performance and reliability optimizations and improvements
